show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Debt: Uncharted WatersOur Ultimate Undoing
content:
People still don’t appreciate that debt is in no way synonymous with wealth. <!--more--> The purpose of debt should not be to feed consumption: it should feed production.
But it doesn’t work that way in today’s upside-down society.
Spending more than you earn is going to have dire consequences very soon.
A short discussion by three professionals about the extinction of the middle class in America.
A quick overview of how much Americans earn.
The pundits, of course, include debt in the earnings figures.
Spending is/has been rising again.
Total debt is now over three times GDP.
The Fed continues unabatedly printing money from nothing.
An update on Greece’s problems.
A current assessment of the US economy.
Japan’s own trap.
Potential problems with bank deposits.
